Content.Text: You cannot go there while in Edit Mode.

Focus on editing right now!
This needs to be placed in the town.
This needs to be placed on your farm.

This needs to be placed in the town
or on your farm.

There is no reason to go indoors while
in Edit Mode.

Don't try to take that over there!
If you change that piece of ground,
you'll lose your crops.

Don't try to take that over there!
If you relocate your beehive to a new
environment, the bees will escape.

Don't try to take that over there!
If you move your mushroom log to a
new place, you'll lose your mushrooms.

Don't try to take that over there!
If you move your livewell to a
new place, you'll lose your fish.
You can't hold that. Inventory is full.

Stop! An animal is inside.

Stop! Someone lives there.

Stop! Fish are living there.
